description: Karl is a Crown City newspaper reporter trying to find out "The Secret of Koudai" (コーダイの秘密 (Koudai no Himitsu)). He always has a camera in hand and he was able to record the confession and events of Grings Koudai as he attempted to capture the second ripple of time`s energy. Rowena was also able to give Karl the insider information that would help prove that Grings Koudai was guilty for the crimes he had committed. Karl`s grandpa Joe lives in the old section of Crown City and they were reunited.
name: Kurt
